alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Northern Sweet Grass; Red Lodge Foothills (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:09PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Stillwater, west central Carbon and central Sweet Grass Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 17 miles west of Absarokee, or 27 miles south of Big Timber, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported half inch hail near Nye. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fishtail, Dean and Nye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
